data.decision: Project Constitution v1 schema defined for Cartridge Memory System
data.rationale: Constitution is the "laws of this project" - tiny (1-3K tokens), enforceable, versioned, traceable to decisions. Structure: north_star (statement + primary user job), laws (atomic rules with strength hard/soft, applies_to, provenance), constraints (do_not + accessibility), patterns_top (best practices), deciding_axes (meta-heuristics for taste), conflict_policy (order + tie_break). Promotion feeds into this: preferences become laws, tactics become patterns, procedural becomes skills.
alternatives: Flat rules list (rejected: no conflict resolution)
No provenance tracking (rejected: can't trace why rules exist)
